description.en:
Handle, Store & Process all of your forage goods.
RECIPES: - Grass Silage: 500L GRASS -> 500L SILAGE, 50L DIGESTATE - Hay Silage: 500L HAY -> 500L SILAGE, 50L DIGESTATE - Chaff Silage: 500L CHAFF -> 500L SILAGE, 50L DIGESTATE - Hay Drying: 500L GRASS -> 500L HAY - Base TMR Mix: 400L Hay + 400L SILAGE + 200L STRAW -> 1000L FORAGE - Mineral TMR Mix: 390L Hay + 390L SILAGE + 190L STRAW + 30L MINERAL_FEED -> 1000L FORAGE
COST: 180,000
INPUTS: - 1,000,000L GRASS - 1,000,000L HAY - 1,000,000L CHAFF - 1,000,000L STRAW - 10,000L MINERAL_FEED
OUTPUTS: - 2,000,000L SILAGE - 2,000,000L FORAGE (Total Mixed Ration) - 150,000L DIGESTATE
description.fr:
Manipulez, stockez et traitez tous vos produits fourragers.
RECETTES: - Ensilage d'herbe: 500L GRASS -> 500L SILAGE, 50L DIGESTATE - Ensilage de foin: 500L HAY -> 500L SILAGE, 50L DIGESTATE - Ensilage de paille: 500L CHAFF -> 500L SILAGE, 50L DIGESTATE - Séchage du foin: 500L GRASS -> 500L HAY - Mélange RTM de base: 400L Hay + 400L SILAGE + 200L STRAW -> 1000L FORAGE - Mélange minéral RTM: 390L Hay + 390L SILAGE + 190L STRAW + 30L MINERAL_FEED -> 1000L FORAGE
COÛT: 180,000
CONTRIBUTIONS: - 1,000,000L GRASS - 1,000,000L HAY - 1,000,000L CHAFF - 1,000,000L STRAW - 10,000L MINERAL_FEED
LES SORTIES: - 2,000,000L SILAGE - 2,000,000L FORAGE (Ration Mixte Totale) - 150,000L DIGESTATE
description.de:
Handhaben, lagern und verarbeiten Sie alle Ihre Futterwaren.
REZEPTUREN: - Grassilage: 500L GRASS -> 500L SILAGE, 50L DIGESTATE - Heu-Silage: 500L HAY -> 500L SILAGE, 50L DIGESTATE - Spreu-Silage: 500L CHAFF -> 500L SILAGE, 50L DIGESTATE - Heutrocknung: 500L GRASS -> 500L HAY - Basis-TMR-Mischung: 400L Hay + 400L SILAGE + 200L STRAW -> 1000L FORAGE - Mineralische TMR-Mischung: 390L Hay + 390L SILAGE + 190L STRAW + 30L MINERAL_FEED -> 1000L FORAGE
KOSTEN: 180,000
EINGÄNGE: - 1,000,000L GRASS - 1,000,000L HAY - 1,000,000L CHAFF - 1,000,000L STRAW - 10,000L MINERAL_FEED
AUSGÄNGE: - 2,000,000L SILAGE - 2,000,000L FORAGE (Total gemischte Ration) - 150,000L DIGESTATE

text.name: function_forageDepot
text.en: Handle, Store & Process all of your forage goods.
text.fr: Manipulez, stockez et traitez tous vos produits fourragers
text.de: Handhaben, lagern und verarbeiten Sie alle Ihre Futtergüter
